accessibility.description: Write a class that accepts a string, creates an Account, returns nothing.
Write a class that accepts a string, creates an Account, returns ID of the account.
Write a class that does not accept a string, creates an Account, returns nothing.
Write a class that does not accept a string, creates an Account in a try catch, returns nothing.
Write a static method. How do you call it?

github.description: Push all your classes & triggers into your github repository.

googling.description: What is this error? "Unable to lock row".
What is the average salary of a salesforce developer in Austin?.
What is the most popular Salesforce blog?
Where can you find the abridged version of Winter 2020 release notes?

governor.description: Write a class that breaks a governor limit.
Write a class that breaks another governor limit.
Rewrite #1 so that it does not break gov limit.
Rewrite #2 so that it does not break gov limit.

html.description: What are 3 ways of creating a list? Create a list in each way.

ide.description: Push changes to a class to github.

images.description: populates Description of every new Account record to be "Yes I can".
runs on Contact updates >>> creates a task for Contact owner with subject "call the contact asap".

javascript.description: Query for 10 Accounts and their Contacts.

performance.description: Create a test class for each of the above classes.
Create a test class for the trigger.

seo.description: Insert 1 account record & analyze the debug log. What do you see?
Create a validation rule on account object.
Insert 1 account & analyze the debug log.

webfonts.description: Iterate over a list on previous slide & print out each value in System.Debug.
Iterate over a list on previous slide & add to a new List.
